conditions.title: Electronics
conditions.description: If a customer changes their mind, they may return the item within [X] days of receipt, provided it is unused, in its original packaging, and in resellable condition. A restocking fee may apply. Refunds will be issued as store credit or to the original payment method at our discretion. Shipping costs for returns are the customer’s responsibility.

conditions.title: General
conditions.description: If the item was bought by mistake, it may be returned within [X] days of receipt, provided it is unused, in its original packaging, and in resellable condition. A restocking fee may apply. Refunds will be issued as store credit or to the original payment method at our discretion. Shipping costs for returns are the customer’s responsibility.

conditions.title: General
conditions.description: If the product doesn't meet the customer's expectations, it may be returned within [X] days of receipt, provided it is unused, in its original packaging, and in resellable condition. A restocking fee may apply. Refunds will be issued as store credit or to the original payment method at our discretion. Shipping costs for returns are the customer’s responsibility.

conditions.title: General
conditions.description: If the product was damaged during delivery, it may be returned within [X] days of receipt. The seller will cover the return shipping costs, and a full refund or replacement will be issued as appropriate. The item must be in its original condition and packaging.

conditions.title: General
conditions.description: If the wrong item was sent, the item may be returned within [X] days of receipt. The seller will cover the return shipping costs, and a full refund or replacement will be issued as appropriate. The item must be in its original condition and packaging.

conditions.title: General
conditions.description: If parts or accessories are missing from the product, it may be returned within [X] days of receipt. The seller will cover the return shipping costs, and a full refund or replacement will be issued. The item must be in its original condition and packaging.

conditions.title: General
conditions.description: If the item is defective or doesn't work as intended, it may be returned within [X] days of receipt. The seller will cover the return shipping costs, and a full refund or replacement will be issued. The item must be in its original condition and packaging.
